attributes.action: encourage the BBC to stop spending licence fee money on the Eurovision Song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year the Eurovision song contest turns into a backslapping contest for eastern european countries.  Why should we finance a large portion of this contest every year when we get nothing from it.  Please try and encourage the BBC to withdraw from this waste of money.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
